title: BRIEF-Novus Holdings Sees HY HEPS To Be Within Range Of 28 Cents & 31 Cents
text:
BRIEF-Novus Holdings Sees HY HEPS To Be Within Range Of 28 Cents & 31 Cents

Stock Markets 16 minutes ago (Oct 28, 2019 09:37)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Novus Holdings Sees HY HEPS To Be Within Range Of 28 Cents & 31 Cents Oct 28 (Reuters) - Novus Holdings Ltd : * TRADING STATEMENT AND CHANGE TO THE BOARD * GROUP EXPECTS ITS BASIC EPS FOR SIX MONTHS ENDING 30 SEPTEMBER 2019 TO BE WITHIN RANGE OF 22 CENTS AND 26 CENTS * EXPECTS HEPS FOR SIX MONTHS ENDING 30 SEPTEMBER 2019 TO BE WITHIN RANGE OF 28 CENTS AND 31 CENTS * UNDER-RECOVERY OF PAPER PRICE INCREASES, MARGIN COMPRESSION, DELAY IN INVOICING OF SOME MATERIAL CONTRACT NEGATIVELY IMPACTED HY EPS

BRIEF-Novus Holdings Sees HY HEPS To Be Within Range Of 28 Cents & 31 Cents
